game.name: OVER THE TOWER
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: OVER THE TOWER is a hack-and-slash clicker game where you defeat enemies with simple mouse clicks. Collect coins to unlock upgrades, and equip the items you obtain to grow even stronger. What will you witness at the top of the tower…?
game.shortDescriptionEn: OVER THE TOWER is a hack-and-slash clicker game where you defeat enemies with simple mouse clicks. Collect coins to unlock upgrades, and equip the items you obtain to grow even stronger. What will you witness at the top of the tower…?
